channel.title: Frame number of farming?

item.title: Frame number of farming?
item.dc:creator: @x_pk3r_xx x pk3r xx
item.description:
@x_pk3r_xx wrote:

hey im looking for the frame number of the farming gratz screen, this is my code:

case 19: // Farming sendFrame164(4261); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a farming level!", 6207); sendFrame126("Your farming level is now "+playerLevel[19]+" .", 6208); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a farming level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[19] >= 99) { addItem(14136, 1); addItem(14137, 1); addItem(14138, 1); sendMessage( "Congratulations, you just recieved the farming skill cape and hood!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just gotten " + playerLevel[19] + " farming!"); } break;

but :

	    sendFrame164(4261);

seems to be the thieving frame lol. so it shows the thieving picture thing when you lvl up.
i cant explain this really good, as iâ€™m not from england sorry.

but anyone knows the correct frame number for farming?
any help? thanks :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 01:57:13 am[/size][hr]anyone?

maybe anyone can check if u have the right frame number on your own server please?
